comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: They say "lebkuchen," a sort of gingerbread cookie -- yum.

comment.author: 7866977@N05
comment._content: Bärenlebkuchen have been made from the company Gebrüder (=Brothers) Schmidt in Mainbernheim, Southern Germany. Lebkuchen are really delicious, my favourite "cookies" at christmas.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks to both of you for providing more information about the cans of German cookies in this photograph.  We will update the title information the next time we edit this record.

comment.author: 43045536@N08
comment._content:
"Original Nuernberger Lebkuchendose"  or in english "Original Nuremberg Lebkuchen-Tin"
